data.actual_result: The resize icon stays in its original place and appears outside of the conversation box
data.expected_result: The resize icon should move along with the overlay if it gets smaller
data.short_description: [Overlay] Switching to a smaller conversation misplaces the resize drag icon
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game with overlay enabled - Open the overlay and - Switch from one conversation to one with a smaller window (a conversation with only a few or even no messages) - Observe the drag-to-resize icon
